why.question: Why mailopinion ?
why.title: Mailopinion is a free service which allows you to measure the quality of your emails.
why.content: Simple to set up, and easily usable by the user, it will allow you to collect feedbacks on your emails through smileys or thumbs, without the user wasting time.

free.title: Free
free.content: Built with Firebase, all functionalities are free to use.

transparent.title: Transparent
transparent.content: It fits perfectly into any email, and requires only one click from users.

fast.title: Fast
fast.content: The system is very quick to set up and integrate into your emails, regardless of the number of emails.

campaigns.title: Campaigns
campaigns.content: Create multiples campaigns on the same account.

comments.title: Comments
comments.content: Users can leave feedback after they have voted.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.content: Easily view the analytics of your campaigns with charts and averages.

flexible.title: Flexible
flexible.content: Multiples widgets are available, with smileys or thumbs.

versatile.title: Versatile
versatile.content: Usefull for emails, it's also can be used in static files (eg. PDF).

steps.title: Installation
steps.content: Follow the installation steps below to create a campaign and see the results.

1.title: Create an account
1.content: You need an account to create campaigns and collect feedback.

2.title: Create a campaign
2.content: Choose an unique name for your campaign.
